long_description: The ENO JungleNest Hammock combines a hammock with a bug net for a quick setup and convenient protection from biting insects when you're camping. Ripstop nylon taffeta base with no-see-um mesh on top protects you from mosquitoes and other biting insects; hammock is quick and easy to set up. Full-length side zipper makes getting in and out of the hammock a breeze. Features internal hanging loops, an organizer pocket and internal height adjustment. The ENO JungleNest Hammock includes 2 aluminum wiregate carabiners for hanging the hammock and an attached compression stuff sack.
short_description: The ENO JungleNest Hammock combines a hammock with a bug net for a quick setup and convenient protection from biting insects when you're camping.
